title: GRILLED CORN AND RICOTTA DIP
directions: Heat the oven to 325°. Heat a grill pan over high and cook the corn until charred on all sides, 25 minutes. Cut the kernels from the cob, and purée two-thirds of the kernels in a food processor with the cream, ricotta, flour, and thyme. Season with salt and pepper and stir in remaining kernels.
Scrape the dip into an 8-inch baking dish, sprinkle with parmesan, and dot with butter; bake until bubbly, about 1 1⁄2 hours. Garnish with chives and scallions to serve.
ingredients: Finely chopped chives and scallions, to garnish
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
